log4j:event.log4j:message: Liferay is configured to use Hypersonic as its database. Do NOT use Hypersonic in production. Hypersonic is an embedded database useful for development and demonstration purposes. The database settings can be changed in portal-ext.properties.
Using dialect com.liferay.portal.dao.orm.hibernate.HSQLDialect for HSQL Database Engine 2.7

Liferay automatically starts a child process of Elasticsearch named sidecar for convenient development and demonstration purposes. Do NOT use sidecar in production. Refer to the documentation for details on the limitations of sidecar and instructions on configuring a remote Elasticsearch connection in the Control Panel.
Navigate to Control Panel > System > Gogo Shell and enter "lb" to see all bundles
